small: Balanced outlook for Boss–Employee. Keep communication clear and gentle.
big: For Boss–Employee, harmony improves when time, respect, and shared routines are maintained. Be practical with decisions and patient with emotions.
remedy: Once a week, spend 20 minutes together in quiet reflection or prayer. Keep a shared note of gratitude.

details.summary: Boss–Employee thrives on trust, clarity, and consistent effort.
details.sinaankInsight: When Mobank and Yogank align numerically, synergy increases and conflicts reduce.
